title: Sin City
description: From the author who brought you the blazingly hot French Quarter comes the sequel, Sin City… Diana Marsh is trying to change her wicked ways and be the good girl her family has always wished for. But when a business trip takes her to Las Vegas and straight into the arms of Marc Davenport, a man she's been flirting with via e-mail and phone for months, all bets are off. The city's aura of sin lures Diana immediately—she decides to seize her last chance to let all her inhibitions go, and Marc is just the sexy man to do it with.
author: Lacey Alexander
